snippet: Mark Lewis, a British lawyer, said he planned to sue in the United States on behalf of victims who allege they were the subject of phone hacking by Rupert Murdoch’s British tabloids.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and ALAN COWELL

lead_paragraph: Mark Lewis, a British lawyer, said he planned to sue in the United States on behalf of victims who allege they were the subject of phone hacking by Rupert Murdoch’s British tabloids.

headline.seo: British Hacking Scandal Suits to Be Filed in U.S.
headline.main: British Hacking Scandal Suits to Be Filed in U.S.
headline.print_headline: British Hacking Scandal Suits to Be Filed in U.S.
